entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
